sections.name: task-event
sections.definition: Task-event-template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

sections.name: in2pb-header
sections.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

properties.name: in2pb-header
properties.definition: Header to be used for metadata templates created for In2PB projects.

sections.name: task-event-header
sections.definition: Header with instructions for the tasks and events metadata.

properties.name: task-event-header
properties.definition: Header with instructions for the tasks and events metadata.

sections.name: task-element
sections.definition: Task metadata used with the common localizer data.

properties.name: otherTaskType
properties.definition: Type of the task if not listed above.

properties.name: taskName
properties.definition: Name of the tasks that would be used in naming the files according to the BIDS specification.

properties.name: otherTaskName
properties.definition: Name of the task if not listed above and used with the task label in folder organization.

properties.name: taskConfig
properties.definition: Relative or absolute path to the configuration file used for each of the specified task.

properties.name: taskDescription
properties.definition: A text based description of the tasks used for the data.

properties.name: taskComment
properties.definition: Additional remarks on the tasks being described.

sections.name: event-codes-element
sections.definition: Metadata describing the event or behavioural codes associated with the experimental data.

properties.name: code
properties.definition: The event/behavioural code used during the experimental run.

properties.name: codeName
properties.definition: The event/behavioural code name, corresponding to the code used during the experimental run.

properties.name: codeDescription
properties.definition: A short human-readable description of the code.

sections.name: free-text-field
sections.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.

properties.name: free-text-field
properties.definition: A free text element to allow the user to provide any additional information.
